long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows a motivational quote when you launch Construct 3.
This Chrome extension is a test project. I wanted to try and create something with Svelte and Construct 3.
I uploaded the source code to GitHub.
